nhc_headline: ...OSCAR BRINGING HURRICANE CONDITIONS, HEAVY RAINFALL, AND STORM  SURGE TO PORTIONS OF EASTERN CUBA...
summary:
...OSCAR BRINGING HURRICANE CONDITIONS, HEAVY RAINFALL, AND STORM  SURGE TO PORTIONS OF EASTERN CUBA...
 As of 8:00 PM EDT Sun Oct 20
 the center of Oscar was located near 20.2, -74.5
 with movement WSW at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 988 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
